Resistance.display_help: The Alpha Wolf is resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. It also has a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Vicious_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Wild_Charge.display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Note that Wild Charge is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Maiming_Bite.display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Maiming_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Growl.display_help: The Alpha Wolf snarls at nearby enemies reducing their Damage and Chance to Hit moderately for a short time. Note that Growl is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

PM_Growl.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Train_Beasts.display_help: Your Alpha Wolf has been trained, it can now using Maiming Bite and Growl.

Howl.display_help: The Wolf lets out a piercing Howl inspiring nearby beasts to greater acts of ferocity thus increasing their damage output briefly. Recharge: Very Slow
Howl.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} lets out an howl bolstering the damage of nearby beast allies!

Lick_Wounds.display_help: Should the beast become wounded they will lick their wounds to recover a small amount of health and recover additional health over time. Recharge: Long

Tame_Beasts.display_help: Your Alpha Wolf has been tamed it can now use Howl and Lick Wounds.

Fire.display_help: You are taking Fire damage from the flames.
Fire.display_target_help: You are taking Fire damage from the flames.

Resistance.display_help: Robots are resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. It has a Plasma Blast and melee Smash attack.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

Plasma_Blast.display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

Smash.display_help: The Assault Bot has Disoriented you.

Dual_Plasma_Blast.display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

Flamethrower.display_help: The Assault Bot's Flamethrower is doing Fire damage over time to you.

Equip.display_help: This Assault Bot has been Equipped. It can now fire Dual Plasma Blasts and has a Flamethrower.

Swarm_Missiles.display_help: Assault Bot can launch a pack of 8 Swarm missiles.

Incendiary_Swarm_Missiles.display_help: Assault Bot can launch a pack of 8 Incendiary Swarm missiles.

Upgrade.display_help: This Assault Bot has been Upgraded. It can now fire Swarm Missiles and Incendiary Missiles.

Resistance.display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also hurl Ice Bolts at their foes.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Claw_Rake.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Enchant_Demon.display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can use an Ice Blast attack.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Frost Breath.

Resistance.display_help: Body armor gives the Commando resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse, Fear and Placate. His experience in the elements makes him slightly resistant to Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. He can fire a Burst or a single heavy Slug from his Assault Rifle.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Buckshot.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of Buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Full_Auto.display_help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Equip.display_help: This Commando has been Equipped. He can now fire Buckshot or fire a Full Auto burst from his Assault Rifle.

M30_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Flamethrower.display_help: Spews forth a cone of flames from underneath the barrel of your assault rifle, setting foes on fire. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Extreme(DoT) Recharge: Slow
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire and you are burning.

LRM_Rocket.display_help: The LRM Rocket is a powerful piece of hardware. It is very accurate and has a very long range. The impressive round can knock down its target. Like most sniper attacks, you must take your time to aim, so this attack can be interrupted. You must have two other Munitions Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
LRM_Rocket.display_short_help: Sniper (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG(Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

Auto_Turret.display_help: You can place a stationary Auto Turret on the ground. The Auto Turret has an extremely fast fire rate and is equipped with a customized tracking system. Once locked on, the Turret will continue to unload a volley of lead into the target until it is destroyed or is out of range. The Turret is armored, but can be destroyed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Tactical_Upgrade.display_help: This Commando has been Tactically Upgraded. He can now fire a M30 Grenade, LRM Rocket and Flamethrower from his Assault Rifle.

Resistance.display_help: Demon Princes are resistant to Fear, Confuse, Placate and Sleep effects. They also have defense against Lethal, Smashing, Fire and Cold attacks. They can use Ice Blast and Shiver.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: Def(Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold) Res(Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Shiver.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.display_target_help: You are shivering. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Shiver.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.
Chilling_Embrace.display_victim_hit: The {PowerName} from {PlayerSource} slows your attack and movement speed.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Block_of_Ice.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed and take some Cold damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Block_of_Ice.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Enchant_Demon.display_help: This Demon Prince has been Enchanted. He is now has access to Chilling Embrace, Ice Sword and Block of Ice.

Ice_Slash.display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ice_Slash.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Frozen_Aura.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. When you perform a Frozen Aura, nearby foes will be frozen within a fragile casing of ice and suffer a moderate amount of cold damage. These frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals moderate damage. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow
Frozen_Aura.display_target_help: You have been chilled and cannot act until awakened.

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: This Demon Prince has been Empowered. It can now use Ice Slash and Frozen Aura.

Resistance.display_help: Dire Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Vicious_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Wild_Charge.display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Note that Wild Charge is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Chilling_Howl.display_help: The Dire Wolf lets out a concentrated, but narrow blast of arctic air that chills foes causing Moderate Cold damage and additional lingering Cold damage as well as reducing the target's movement and attack speeds. Note that Chilling Howl is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Chilling_Howl.display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Moderate DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed, -Fly
Chilling_Howl.display_target_help: You're suffering cold damage over time and have your movement and recharge rate reduced slightly.

PM_Chilling_Howl.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Freezing_Roar.display_help: The Dire Wolf breathes out freezing air in a broad cone in front of it chilling all foes for Moderate Cold damage and lingering Cold Damage over time. Affected foes will also have their movement and attack speeds reduced. Note that Freezing Roar is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Roar.display_target_help: You're suffering cold damage over time and have your movement and recharge rate reduced slightly.

PM_Freezing_Roar.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Maiming_Bite.display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Maiming_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Train_Beasts.display_help: Your Dire Wolf has been trained, it can now use Maiming Bite and Chilling Howl.

Terrible_Howl.display_help: The Dire Wolf is capable of letting out a Terrible Roar that will cause High Cold damage, slow and terrorize all nearby foes for a short time. Recharge: Slow
Terrible_Howl.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Foe Terrorize, Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed

PM_Terrible_Howl.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Will_of_the_Wild.display_help: When the Dire Wolf is dangerously low on health it will become enraged and suffer significantly less damage for a short time as well as recovering a portion of its health. Once this power wears off it will leave it partially drained of endurance. Note that Will of the Wild is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Tame_Beasts.display_help: Your Dire Wolf has been tamed it can now use Terrible Howl and Will of the Wild.

Resistance.display_help: Battle Drones are resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. Battle Drones can fire a Laser Blast and Smash foes at melee.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

Heavy_Laser_Burst.display_help: This Heavy Leaser Burst takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and can send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Equip.display_help: This Battle Drone has been Equipped. It can now fire a Heavy Laser Burst.

Full_Auto_Laser.display_help: You are being blasted by a Full Auto attack from the Robots Laser Blaster.

Upgrade.display_help: This Battle Drone has been Upgraded. It can now fire a Full Auto Last Blast attack.

Resistance.display_help: Ember Demons are resistant to Fear effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Fire Blast and Shield of Hellfire.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Fear, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Shield_of_Hellfire.display_help: The Ember Demon bathes your allies in an Ember Shield increasing their damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.display_short_help: Auto PBAoE, Ally +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)
Shield_of_Hellfire.display_target_help: The Ember Shield has increased your resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} protects {PlayerDest} with its {PowerName} increasing their resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Shield_of_Hellfire.display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Toxic and Cold damage.

Ember_Shield_Owner.display_help: The Ember Demon's Ember Shield grants an additional damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage bonus to its owner.
Ember_Shield_Owner.display_short_help: Auto PBAoE, Owner +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)
Ember_Shield_Owner.display_target_help: The Ember Shield has increased your resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Ember_Shield_Owner.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} protects {PlayerDest} with its {PowerName} increasing their resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage.
Ember_Shield_Owner.display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Toxic and Cold damage.

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Abyssal_Mending.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. This power can only be used on other summoned demons. Recharge: Fast

Enchant_Demon.display_help: Your Ember Demon has been Enchanted. It can now heal demon allies using Abyssal Mending as well as use its Fire Breath power.

Fire_Ball.display_help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Abyssal_Reconstruction.display_help: An Ember Demon can channel hellfire through all nearby allies. This power has a long recharge and can only be used on allies.

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: Your Ember Demon has been Empowered. It can now use Abyssal Reconstruction and Abyssal Empowerment.

Resistance.display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also hurl fiery flares at their foes.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Claw_Rake.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Enchant_Demon.display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can now use a Fire Blast attack.

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Fire Breath.

Resistance.display_help: Genin have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks. They are resistant to Confuse and Taunt and are excellent runners. Genin have a Thunder Kick and Shurikens.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(Confuse, Taunt), +SPD,

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Train.display_help: This Genin has been Trained. He can now throw more powerful Shuriken and can use a Storm Kick.

Aimed_Shot.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Costume1.display_help: This Genin has been Enlightened. He can now use a Crane Kick and throw Exploding Shuriken. He can now also Super Leap.

Enlighten.display_help: This Genin has been Enlightened. He can now use a Crane Kick and throw Exploding Shuriken. He can now also Super Leap.

Resistance.display_help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage. They can cast Ghastly Blasts, Life Drain, and can hold foes with a Necroplasmic Grasp.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic

Phase_Shift.display_help: Ghosts can Phase Shift into the negative plane and becomes out of sync with normal space. While Phase Shifted, they are in touch with their native plane and can regenerate quickly.

Ghastly_Blast.display_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by a Ghastly Blast.

Life_Drain.display_help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Enchant.display_help: This Ghost has been Enchanted. It can now cast Life Drain.

Necroplasmic_Grasp.display_help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.

Empower.display_help: This Ghost has been Empowered. It can now cast Necroplasmic Grasp.

Resistance.display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Corruption on their foes.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic
Resistance.display_target_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Corruption on their foes.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Corruption.display_help: You fire a bolt of hellfire corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
Corruption.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res
Corruption.display_target_help: Corruption continues to deal additional toxic damage over time as well as reducing your target's damage resistance.

Claw_Rake.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Hellfire.display_help: Sends a Blast of Hellfire at a targeted foe dealing both Fire and Toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Hellfire.display_target_help: Hellfire is reducing your target's damage resistance.

Enchant_Demon.display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can now use a Hellfire blast attack.

Hellfire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of hellfire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hellfire_Breath.display_target_help: Hellfire is reducing your target's damage resistance.

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Hellfire Breath.

Resistance.display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Corruption on their foes.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Sleep, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

Claw_Rake.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Claw_Slash.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal and toxic damage. This attack also has a chance to knock down an enemy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Corruption.display_help: You fire a bolt of hellfire corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
Corruption.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res
Corruption.display_target_help: Corruption continues to deal additional toxic damage over time as well as reducing your target's damage resistance.

Breath_of_Hellfire.display_help: You spew hellfire from your mouth dealing fire and toxic damage too all enemies within its short and narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range, all foes that are hit will have the damage resistance decreased. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Hellfire_Aura.display_help: While active, you are surrounded by unholy flames that burn all foes that attempt to enter melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Hellfire_Aura.display_target_help: You are burning due to being too near the Hellfire Aura.

Enchant_Demon.display_help: Your Hellfire Gargoyle has been Enchanted. It is now wreathed in a Hellfire Aura dealing toxic damage to those that get near it and can use Breath of Hellfire.

Hellfire_Smash.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Hellfire clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hellfire_Burst.display_help: Your mastery of hellfire allows you to conjure up this unholy flame at will blasting any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Abyssal_Empowerment.display_help: Your Hellfire Gargoyle has been Empowered. It can now use Hellfire Smash and Hellfire Burst.

Resistance.display_help: Howler Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Vicious_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Wild_Charge.display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Note that Wild Charge is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Maiming_Bite.display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Maiming_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Train_Beasts.display_help: Your Howler Wolves have been trained, they can now use Maiming Bite.

Howl.display_help: The Wolf lets out a piercing Howl inspiring nearby beasts to greater acts of ferocity thus increasing their damage output briefly. Note that Howl is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} lets out an howl bolstering the damage of nearby beast allies!

Throat_Bite.display_help: The wolf charges its foe in an attempt to knock them off guard. Feral Charge causes high smashing damage, reduces defense and has a good chance to knock its target down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Throat_Bite.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

PM_Throat_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Tame_Beasts.display_help: Your Howler Wolves have been tamed, they can now use Howl and Throat Bite.

Resistance.display_help: Jounin have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks. They are resistant to Confuse and Taunt and are excellent runners. They can use a Sting of the Wasp and a Gambler's Cut with their Ninja Blade. Jounin can also use Caltrops.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(Confuse, Taunt), +SPD,

Hack.display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Slash.display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Caltrops.display_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Disembowel.display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Poison_Dart.display_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.

Train.display_help: This Jounin has been Trained. He can now use a Soaring Dragon with his Ninja Blade and can fire Poison Darts.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Head Splitter even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Blinding_Powder.display_help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.
Blinding_Powder.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} blinds {PlayerDest} with their {PowerName} putting them to sleep and reducing their chance to hit and perception!
Blinding_Powder.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} blinds you with their {PowerName} putting you to sleep and reducing your chance to hit and perception!

Hide.display_help: The very essence of what makes a Stalker. Hide allows you to blend into your environment, making you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment related powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Costume1.display_help: This Jounin has been Enlightened. He can now execute a Golden Dragonfly. He can also Hide and use Blinding Powder.

Enlighten.display_help: This Jounin has been Enlightened. He can now execute a Golden Dragonfly. He can also Hide and use Blinding Powder.

Resistance.display_help: The Lich is resistant to Sleep and Fear. It is also resistant to Negative Energy, Toxic and Cold damage. The Lich can cast Dark Blast and Torrent.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Negative, Toxic, Cold
Resistance.display_target_help: Spirits are non corporeal and highly resistant to Immobilization smashing, lethal and negative energy damage. However, they are vulnerable to Energy and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, Negative, Immobilize

Dark_Blast.display_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

Torrent.display_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

Life_Drain.display_help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Costume1.display_help: This Lich has been Enchanted. He can now cast Tenebrous Tentacles and Life Drain.

Enchant.display_help: This Lich has been Enchanted. He can now cast Tenebrous Tentacles and Life Drain.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Costume2.display_help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

Mode2.display_help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

Empower.display_help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

Resistance.display_help: Lionesses are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Claw_Rake.display_help: The beast swipes their target with their razor sharp claws causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Claw_Rake.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Rake.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Claw_Rake.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Vicious_Bite.display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Moderate Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Vicious_Bite.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT (Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

PM_Vicious_Bite.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Wild_Charge.display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Note that Wild Charge is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

Lions_Roar.display_help: At the beginning of battle the Lion will let out a terrible roar that bolsters the defense of nearby beasts moderately for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Lions_Roar.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} lets out an howl bolstering the defense of nearby beast allies!

Lick_Wounds.display_help: Should the beast become wounded they will lick their wounds to recover a small amount of health and recover additional health over time. Recharge: Long

Train_Beasts.display_help: The Lioness has been trained and now can use Lick Wounds and Train Beasts.

Ferocious_Growl.display_help: The beast rattles her foes by letting out a ferocious growl. Affected foes will be stunned for a short time. Recharge: Long

PM_Ferocious_Growl.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Claw_Swipe.display_help: The beast lashes out with a very wide swipe of its claws striking all foes in front of them causing Moderate Lethal damage and causing Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Claw_Swipe.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Swipe.display_target_help: You are bleeding from the Lioness' Claw Swipe.

PM_Claw_Swipe.display_help: This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

Tame_Beasts.display_help: The Lioness has been tamed and can now use Ferocious Growl and Claw Swipe.

Resistance.display_help: Living Hellfire can only exist on the material plane for a short time, they have moderate resistance to fire and toxic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto: Res(Fire, Toxic)

Claw_Rake.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Resistance.display_help: Body armor gives Soldiers resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He has a Sub Machine Gun Burst, and has a Med Kit to heal allies.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Confuse, Placate)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Med_Kit.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. This power is interruptible, so you shouldn't use this in combat.

SMG_Burst.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.
SMG_Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

SMG_Heavy_Burst.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.
SMG_Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

Equip.display_help: This Medic has been Equipped. He can now fire a Heavy Burst.

Stimulant.display_help: Frees an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. This power is interruptible and shouldn't be used in the heat of combat.
Stimulant.display_short_help: Close, Ally Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse)
Stimulant.display_target_help: The Stimulant provides some resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects.
Stimulant.display_target_short_help: Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse)
Stimulant.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} uses their {PowerName} to protect {PlayerDest} from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects.
Stimulant.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from IImmobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects with a Stimulant.

Frag_Grenade.display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Frag_Grenade.display_target_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Tactical_Upgrade.display_help: This Medic has been Tactically Upgraded. He now has a Hand Grenade and can use a Stimulant on Allies to protect them from control effects.

Resistance.display_help: Oni are resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Confuse and Taunt. They have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks and are excellent runners. The Oni has a Fiery Katana and can cast Fire Blast.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +DEF(All but Psionics), +SPD,

Fire_Sword_Slash.display_help: You are on fire and burning!
Fire_Sword_Slash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: You are on fire and burning!
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Sword_Hack.display_help: You are on fire and burning!
Fire_Sword_Hack.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Fire_Breath.display_help: You are on fire and burning!
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Train.display_help: This Oni has been Trained. He now has a seconds attack with his Fiery Katana, can cast Ring of Fire and has Fire Breath.

Char.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring him with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Char.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Rain_of_Fire.display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Enlighten.display_help: This Oni has been Enlightened. He can now cast Char and Rain of Fire.

Resistance.display_help: The Protector Bot is resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. It has a Laser Burst and can cast Force Shields on allies.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

Laser_Burst.display_help: Fires a Heavy laser. Recharge: Moderate

Force_Shield.display_help: You have been given a Force Shield. Your Defense to attacks is increased.
Force_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all attacks with a {PowerName}.

Heavy_Laser_Burst.display_help: This Heavy Leaser Burst takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and can send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Repair.display_help: Repairs one Robot Henchmen. This power only works on your Robot Henchmen. Recharge: Slow

Equip.display_help: This Protector Bot has been Equipped. It can now Fire a Heavy Laser Burst and can Repair other Robots.

Photon_Grenade.display_help: The Photon Grenade has Disoriented you.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks including Psionic and Area of Effect attacks. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and is providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Seeker_Drones.display_help: You creates two Seeker Drones. These Seeker Drones will follow you until they detect an enemy and then they will zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
Seeker_Drones.display_short_help: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

Upgrade.display_help: This Protector Bot has been Upgraded. It can now fire a Photon Grenade and create Seeker Drones.

Resistance.display_help: Grave Knights are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage. He can Hack and Slash with his Rusty Sword and can fire Dark Blasts.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic

Hack.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Confuse, Placate)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Resistance.display_help: Body armor gives this Spec Ops Soldier resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He can fire a Burst, Heavy Burst and Web Grenade from his SCAR Rifle.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Confuse, Placate)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Web_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} entangling you!

Rifle_Butt.display_help: You have been Disoriented with a Rifle butt.
Rifle_Butt.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented with a Rifle butt.

Flash_Bang.display_help: The Flash Bang Grenade has exploded near you. You feel Disoriented and cannot focus. Your chance to hit and Perception have been reduced.

Flash_Bang.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} disorienting you reducing your chance to hit and lowering your perception.

Equip.display_help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Equipped. He can now fire a Flash-Bang Grenade from his SCAR Rifle to Disorient foes. He can also Disorient foes with a Rifle Butt.

SCAR_Snipe.display_help: The SpecOps Combat assault rifle, or SCAR, can be used as a Sniper Rifle to take out a target at extreme range.

Tear_Gas.display_help: The Tear Gas is making you choke. Your Damage is Debuffed.
Tear_Gas.display_target_help: The Tear Gas is making you choke. Your Damage is Debuffed.
Tear_Gas.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} hits {PlayerDest} with their {PowerName} reducing their damage and causes them to choke!
Tear_Gas.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} reducing your damage and causing you to choke!

Stealth.display_help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense from melee and ranged attacks. If, however, you attack while using this power, you will be discovered and will lose your Stealth and some of your Defense bonus. Stealth will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Very low Endurance cost.

Tactical_Upgrade.display_help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Tactically Upgraded. He can now fire a Sniper Shot from his SCAR and a Tear Gas Grenade that can choke and debuff a foes Damage. He can also use Stealth.

Resistance.display_help: Experience Give the Arsonist some resistance to Fire. He can throw Molotov Cocktails and is an excellent Brawler.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Lethal, Fire)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Molotov_Cocktail.display_help: The Arsonist has set you on fire with his Molotov Cocktail!
Molotov_Cocktail.display_target_help: The Arsonist has set you on fire with his Molotov Cocktail!

Spit_Fire.display_help: The arsonist can breath or Spit Fire by spaying alcohol from his mouth and igniting it with his lighter. Spit Fire burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Spit_Fire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Equipped.display_help: This Arsonist has been Equipped. He can now Breath Fire.

Upgraded.display_help: This Arsonist has been Upgraded. He can now throw petrol bomb and ignite the ground.

Resistance.display_help: The Bruiser is a Brute. He has good resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage and some resistance to Fire and Cold Damage. He is street wise and Their training makes them resistant to Confuse, Fear and Placate. His experience in the elements makes him slightly resistant to Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. He can fire a Burst or a single heavy Slug from his Assault Rifle.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

Jab.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Fury.display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

Fury_Buff.display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

Rage_Dampen.display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Equipped.display_help: This Bruiser has been Equipped. He now has Haymaker, and Hand Clap.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: You can perform a Knockout Blow on your opponent. This punch does Superior damage, and has a great chance of Holding your target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You have been hit by a piece of concrete and cannot fly.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Upgraded.display_help: This Bruiser has been Upgraded. He now has Knockout Blow, Hurl, and Foot Stomp.

Upgrade_Equipment_1_3.display_help: This Bruiser has been Upgraded. He now has Knockout Blow, Hurl, and Foot Stomp.

Upgrade_Equipment_3_4.display_help: This Bruiser has been Upgraded. He now has Knockout Blow, Hurl, and Foot Stomp.

Resistance.display_help: Leather Jackets gives the Enforcer some resistance to Lethal Damage. He can fire a Burst and Heavy Burst with his Sub-machine Gun. He is also a very good leader and can buff the Defense of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Maneuvers.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Lethal)

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Resistance.display_help: Punks have no inherent resistances. They do, however, benefit greatly from the Leadership of an Enforcer. This Punk carries a Pistol and is an excellent Brawler.
Resistance.display_short_help: Thugs

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Pistol.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Pistols.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Dual_Wield.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Resistance.display_help: Thug Posse are many, but they are very weak.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res(Lethal)

Fireman_Axe.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Fireman's Axe.

Baseball_Bat.display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

Pipe.display_help: Pick up a stick or a piece of pipe and clobber your foes.

Automatic_Pistol.display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

Revolver.display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

Rock.display_help: Thugs can pick up a small rocks and throw then at their foes. Not much damage.

Sledgehammer.display_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

Resistance.display_help: Zombie are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Smashing, Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage. They have a powerful Brawling attack.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Smashing, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic

Projectile_Vomit.display_help: The Zombies can Projectile Vomits a corrosive bile that deals Toxic damage over time.

Zombie_Vomit.display_help: The Zombie's toxic vomits is burning your flesh.

Enchant.display_help: This Zombie has been Empowered. He can now Vomit and Projectile Vomit.

Siphon_Life.display_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

Empower.display_help: This Zombie has been Empowered. He can now Siphon Life.
